articles.title: County set to begin foreclosure proceedings against mall
articles.description: AKRON, Ohio (AP) — A county in Ohio is set to begin foreclosure proceedings against a mall over unpaid property taxes, the chief of staff for the county's fiscal officer has said.
articles.content:
AKRON, Ohio (AP) A county in Ohio is set to begin foreclosure proceedings against a mall over unpaid property taxes, the chief of staff for the county's fiscal officer has said.
The Chapel Hill Mall in Akron owes more than $166,000 in back taxes, and a bill … [+786 chars]

articles.title: Police investigating shots fired near school bus
articles.description: PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) — Providence police are investigating a shooting near a school bus that scared about 50 elementary school students and worried parents and school officials.
articles.content:
PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) Providence police are investigating a shooting near a school bus that scared about 50 elementary school students and worried parents and school officials.

articles.title: Virtual reality lets visitors experience Table Rock summit
articles.description: PICKENS, S.C. (AP) — A virtual reality project is letting people experience a tough hike at a South Carolina state park in a matter of minutes and without taking a step.
articles.content:
PICKENS, S.C. (AP) A virtual reality project is letting people experience a tough hike at a South Carolina state park in a matter of minutes and without taking a step.
Many people aren't able to make the strenuous 3.6-mile trek that climbs 2,000 feet to the … [+1597 chars]

articles.title: Iranian state TV reports Iran will no longer abide by any limits of its 2015 nuclear deal.
articles.description: TEHRAN, Iran (AP) — Iranian state TV reports Iran will no longer abide by any limits of its 2015 nuclear deal.

articles.title: Less common flu strain prominent this year in Virginia
articles.description: RICHMOND, Va. (AP) — Public health officials say a type of flu virus that's usually less prevalent is being reported more frequently in Virginia this year.
articles.content:
RICHMOND, Va. (AP) Public health officials say a type of flu virus that's usually less prevalent is being reported more frequently in Virginia this year.

articles.title: Authorities: 6 hospitalized after house explosion in Detroit
articles.description: DETROIT (AP) — Six people were hospitalized after an apparent gas explosion at a house on Detroit's west side, authorities said.
articles.content:
DETROIT (AP) Six people were hospitalized after an apparent gas explosion at a house on Detroit's west side, authorities said.
No deaths were reported. The cause of the blast remained under investigation, authorities said.
